column5: Here I sit, sipping my vino Words I wish to convey My heart felt wishes for the best in 2008  A Merry Christmas I did not wish But A Happy New Year I will not miss  There are a few people on this board to whom I would like to say thank you. Aplumma, you threw me a line...thank you. Photoz, you made me hold my head up...thank you. Bassloadingzone, you kicked my butt...thank you.  Actually, OFC thanks for putting up with me.    I will be away for next month or so.  Wishing you all the very best.  Quand ont a besoin un amis, OFC et la.  Merci.  (translation:  When one needs a friend...OFC is there.  Thank You)  Nancy
Well, whatever it is you're doing for the next while, wish you the best and we'll keep "putting up" with you anytime.
someone once said " wine is fine but liquor is quicker"  Keep the faith there
Australian Shiraz....the best truth serum going!!! As Red Green would say "Keep your stick on the ice" Happy 2008 back at you.
